description: In exchange for supplying markets with the finest of Zuna weapons, armor, and products, Markets were required to pay an additional tax to those in charge of the supplies at Zunayus.
tooltip: In exchange for supplying markets with the finest of Zuna weapons, armor, and products, Markets were required to pay an additional tax to those in charge of the supplies at Zunayus. (+1 Rupee Resource Trickle/1 second - Market Structure)
